title: Horncastle
description: Site of lesser Roman walled town in present-day Lincolnshire, with occupation possibly as early as 1st century CE. The city walls, however likely do not predate the 4th century CE. Candidate location for Bannovallum (the other being Caistor).

properties.description: After OSM location of Roman walled town at Horncastle
properties.title: Representative center point of walled town
